data.DescriptionHtml: As summon undead I, except that you can summon one undead from the 3rd-level list, 1d3 undead of the same type from the 2nd-level list, or 1d4+1 undead of the same type from the 1st-level list.
data.Effect: One or more summoned creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
data.Name: Summon Undead III
